ModMetaData.name: Stroyent
ModMetaData.description:
Version .99b
Adds the ability to process Human flesh into Stroyent, a meat-like foodstuff.
Thanks to JuliaEllie for inspiration from the Apothecarius mod, Kirid for the snazzy Stroyent icon, and our community who helped make this possible. Enjoy!
ModMetaData.author: Cyrus
